--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Quilldart walked onto the bridge. "I gave the new girl her memory 
back. He 
> walked over and handed him a disk. Galvatron put it into a slide 
poclet in 
> his hip. "Very good Quilldart. Empath I want you and Quilldart to 
bring 
> Nightshade on a routine scouting mission. We know barely anything of 
the 
> tripred defenses. If our little espionage plot does not 
work....we'll need 
> that information. You will be in charge so Quilldart follow her 
orders."
